annotations.kubernetes.io/description: Contains a CA bundle that can be used to verify the kube-apiserver when using internal endpoints such as the internal service IP or kubernetes.default.svc. No other usage is guaranteed across distributions of Kubernetes clusters.

data.config.yaml:
# from .Values.console.config
connect: {}
kafka:
  brokers:
  - redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local:9093
  - redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local:9093
  - redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local:9093
  sasl:
    enabled: false
  schemaRegistry:
    enabled: false
    tls:
      enabled: false
    urls:
    - http://redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local:8081
    - http://redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local:8081
    - http://redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local:8081
  tls:
    enabled: false
redpanda:
  adminApi:
    enabled: true
    urls:
    - http://redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644
    - http://redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644
    - http://redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644

data.bootstrap.yaml:
admin_api_require_auth: false
audit_enabled: false
cloud_storage_backend: aws
cloud_storage_bucket: fgp-redpanda-trading-prod
cloud_storage_cache_size: 5368709120
cloud_storage_credentials_source: sts
cloud_storage_enable_remote_read: false
cloud_storage_enable_remote_write: false
cloud_storage_enabled: true
cloud_storage_region: us-east-2
compacted_log_segment_size: 67108864
default_topic_replications: 3
enable_rack_awareness: true
enable_sasl: true
kafka_batch_max_bytes: 15728640
kafka_connection_rate_limit: 1000
kafka_enable_authorization: true
log_segment_size_max: 268435456
log_segment_size_min: 16777216
max_compacted_log_segment_size: 536870912
partition_autobalancing_mode: continuous
storage_min_free_bytes: 5368709120
superusers:
- kubernetes-controller
data.redpanda.yaml:
config_file: /etc/redpanda/redpanda.yaml
pandaproxy:
  pandaproxy_api:
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    authentication_method: http_basic
    name: internal
    port: 8082
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    authentication_method: http_basic
    name: default
    port: 8083
  pandaproxy_api_tls: null
pandaproxy_client:
  brokers:
  - address: redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-3.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-4.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
redpanda:
  admin:
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    name: internal
    port: 9644
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    name: default
    port: 9645
  admin_api_tls: null
  crash_loop_limit: 5
  empty_seed_starts_cluster: false
  kafka_api:
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    authentication_method: none
    name: internal
    port: 9093
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    authentication_method: sasl
    name: default
    port: 9094
  kafka_api_tls: null
  rpc_server:
    address: 0.0.0.0
    port: 33145
  seed_servers:
  - host:
      address: redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
      port: 33145
  - host:
      address: redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
      port: 33145
  - host:
      address: redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
      port: 33145
  - host:
      address: redpanda-prod-3.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
      port: 33145
  - host:
      address: redpanda-prod-4.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
      port: 33145
rpk:
  additional_start_flags:
  - --default-log-level=info
  - --memory=18432M
  - --reserve-memory=1024M
  - --smp=4
  admin_api:
    addresses:
    - redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644
    - redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644
    - redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644
    - redpanda-prod-3.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644
    - redpanda-prod-4.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9644
    tls: null
  enable_memory_locking: false
  kafka_api:
    brokers:
    - redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9093
    - redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9093
    - redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9093
    - redpanda-prod-3.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9093
    - redpanda-prod-4.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:9093
    tls: null
  overprovisioned: false
  schema_registry:
    addresses:
    - redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:8081
    - redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:8081
    - redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:8081
    - redpanda-prod-3.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:8081
    - redpanda-prod-4.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.:8081
    tls: null
  tune_aio_events: true
schema_registry:
  schema_registry_api:
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    authentication_method: http_basic
    name: internal
    port: 8081
  - address: 0.0.0.0
    authentication_method: http_basic
    name: default
    port: 8084
  schema_registry_api_tls: null
schema_registry_client:
  brokers:
  - address: redpanda-prod-0.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-1.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-2.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-3.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093
  - address: redpanda-prod-4.redpanda-prod.redpanda.svc.cluster.local.
    port: 9093

  - redpanda-prod-3.prod.internalfgp.com:31092
